infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FleetTracker needs your location to track your vehicle's position for fleet management.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: FleetTracker needs your location at all times (including background) so your fleet manager can see your vehicle even when the app is not open.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: FleetTracker needs your location in the background to continuously track your vehicle for fleet management.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Fleet Tracker to use your location at all times for vehicle tracking.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Fleet Tracker to use your location in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Fleet Tracker to use your location while the app is open.
